headline: Goldman Sachs Downgrades Textron (TXT) Stock to Neutral
summary: Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) is one of the Top 10 Transportation and Industrial Stocks to Buy Now. Goldman Sachs downgraded the company’s stock to “Neutral” from “Buy” with a price objective of $85, down from the prior target of $95, as reported by The Fly. The downgrade comes despite the firm’s belief in tight business jet supply and demand dynamics as […]
